enterLineBreak.title: Enter Line Break
enterLineBreak.description: After enabling, press Enter to start a new line, and Shift+Enter to send the message.

enableBubbleMessage.title: Enable Bubble Message
enableBubbleMessage.description: Message will be displayed in a bubble.

forceScrollToBottom.title: Force Scroll To Bottom
forceScrollToBottom.description: Force scroll to bottom when new message is received.

apiUrl.title: Api url
apiUrl.description: The URL of the API to use for the chat.

model.title: Model
model.description: The model to use for the chat.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: The lower this value, the more rigorous the output will be; the higher the value, the more random the output will be.

contextMaxMessages.title: Context Max Messages
contextMaxMessages.description: If the number of tokens in a message exceeds the maximum number of tokens configured for the current request, the number of messages sent will be appropriately reduced until it conforms to the limit set by the maximum tokens configuration.

contextMaxTokens.title: Context Max Tokens
contextMaxTokens.description: The request for tokens is limited by the set number of request messages. Calculate whether the tokens for the specified number of messages exceed this value. If they do, reduce the number of request messages until it falls below this limit.

responseMaxTokens.title: Response Max Tokens
responseMaxTokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate a response. When the value is 0, the number of tokens returned is automatic.

imageCount.title: Image Count
imageCount.description: This parameter is ignored when the model is dall-e-3 because the dall-4-3 model can only generate one image. When the model is dall-e-2, this parameter indicates the number of images generated.

imageSize.title: Image Size
imageSize.description: The size of the generated image.

imageStyle.title: Image Style
imageStyle.description: This parameter just works when the model is dall-e-3. When the model is dall-e-2, this parameter is ignored.

imageQuality.title: Image Quality
imageQuality.description: This parameter just works when the model is dall-e-3. When the model is dall-e-2, this parameter is ignored.
